text:
Tairleigh Dickinson University
RUTHERFORD TEANECK MADISON
FLORHAM-MADISON CAMPUS
285 Madison Avenue
Madison, New Jersey
FRontier 7-4700
August 25, 1966
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 ConnecticutA venue, N. W.
Washington, D. C.
Dear Sirs:
May I receive literature outlining the requirements
for membership in your association and descriptions of the type
of programs you sponsor.
Thank you for your consideration of this request.
